getLegendItemStyle

public LegendItemStyle getLegendItemStyle(int index)
Returns the appropriate legend item style given its index.

Parameters:

Returns:
The corresponding legend item style.

insertLegendItem

public void insertLegendItem(LegendItemStyle legendItemStyle,
                             int index)
Inserts the legend item style at the index. Does not insert if the index is < 0 or > size.

Parameters:
legendItemStyle - The legend item style to insert.
index - The location to insert the item at.
